com.microsoft.azure.iothub.transport.amqps

Class AmqpsSender

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.qpid.proton.engine.BaseHandler
      • com.microsoft.azure.iothub.transport.amqps.AmqpsSender
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    org.apache.qpid.proton.engine.Handler

    public class AmqpsSender
extends org.apache.qpid.proton.engine.BaseHandler
    Instance of the QPID-Proton-J BaseHandler class that overrides the callbacks needed to handle high level open, close, and send functions. Initialize and use the AmqpsSenderHandler class for low level amqps operations.

      Constructor to set up connection parameters

    • Constructor Detail

      • AmqpsSender

        public AmqpsSender(String hostName,
                   String userName,
                   String deviceID,
                   String sasToken)
        Constructor to set up connection parameters
        Parameters:
        hostName - address string of the IoT Hub (example: AAA.BBB.CCC)
        userName - username string to use SASL authentication (example: user@sas.[hostName])
        deviceID - ID from which this sender communicates
        sasToken - SAS token string
